title: What are the funniest K-pop misheard lyrics? - Quora

response.answer_text: You could talk about “the pizza number~” or “I wanna hump big cows, big cars, big rings” all you want, but for me, this is the one that I can never unhear. You guys have heard Bon Bon Chocolat by Everglow, right? Well if you haven’t, what are you doing with your lif— I mean, do give it a listen! It’s a great song with a beautiful music video. Well, we have that one part in the chorus where they all go: Every thing, every thing, you gonna want my everything So apparently, this is what someone heard it as.  ARGH I JUST CAN’T UNHEAR THAT. So thanks, random dude from youtube, for ruining my Everglow-jam session. This is literally what pops up in my head every time I listen to BBC.  Everglow heading to Walmart, yee (on a side note, stan everglow for clear skin) ~dy. n

I spend a lotta time in my car, listening to international music. So I’m always hearing weird crap. It got to the point where I just compiled a bunch of it, and these were born… Monsta X  Wealthy drug addicts that own a brothel and too many cats. They have a problem with Jews and BTS. BTS  BTS live in a terrifying world of social drama and toxic relationships. VIXX  Sadistic psychopaths that keep all kinds of surprises in their car, especially dogs. (ATEEZ coming soon. They seem to be terrible zoologists that can’t control their leader.)
